import React,{useState}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Sidebar(_ref){let{categories,selectedAlgorithm}=_ref;const[openCategory,setOpenCategory]=useState(null);const handleToggleCategory=category=>{setOpenCategory(openCategory===category?null:category);};// Ánh xạ tên danh mục và item sang đường dẫn route
const getRoutePath=(category,item)=>{if(category==='Data Structures'){return`/data-structures/${item.toLowerCase()}`;}return`/algorithms/${encodeURIComponent(category)}/${encodeURIComponent(item)}`;};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("aside",{className:"bg-light border-end p-3",style:{width:'250px',height:'100vh',overflowY:'auto',position:'sticky',top:0},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{className:"mb-3",children:"Danh M\u1EE5c Thu\u1EADt To\xE1n"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"list-group",children:Object.keys(categories).map(category=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"list-group-item border-0 p-0",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-link w-100 text-start text-dark",onClick:()=>handleToggleCategory(category),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:category})}),openCategory===category&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"list-unstyled ps-3",children:categories[category].map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:getRoutePath(category,item),className:`btn w-100 text-start p-2 text-dark ${selectedAlgorithm===item?'bg-info text-white':''}`,children:item})},item))})]},category))})]});}export default Sidebar;
